title: Sawbones: Fever
description:
Any species could have created a bunch of bogus ways to treat fevers. But only humans could use fevers as a bogus treatment for other stuff and then end up being sort of right about it. This week on Sawbones, we're burning down the house.

Music: "Medicines" by The Taxpayers
author: sawbones@maximumfun.org (Justin McElroy)
